“Thank YOU PayLeap! I appreciate the “FABULOUS” customer service you provide to me and my business. You are Truly Amazing and I am a Raving Fan!”

– Monica Nielsen

Support

At PayLeap, servicing our customers is always a top priority. Want to chat right now? We’re available for live chat during business hours. Click the orange tab on the right hand side of the screen that says “Ask Us” to talk to an account executive. He or she can help with account set up, customer service or tech support. Anything you need. We’re always available to answer any questions you have about our services pricing with complete transparency.
